modName: No Robot Spiders - Replaces dwarven spiders
summary: NoSpiders changes spiders! This mod was requested by user \"lujenchia\". It changes the Dwarven Spiders to bears.
descriptionHtml:
NoSpider Version 0.1 [WIP]

[b]This has not been updated for a while, it might not work correctly.[/b]

====Description====
This modification changes all robotic spiders in Skyrim into harmless bears, currently it is still a Work-in-Progress. This mod is made for people with arachnophobia, or people that do not like spiders. This mod is compatible with every mod, except those that change dwarven spiders. The bears are called \"Not-So-Mechanic Bear\" ingame.

I am aware that there is a mod like this already, but that one does not change the dwarven spiders. (Someone said that, and requested this).

====Installation====
You can just install this using the Nexus Mod Manager like any other mod.

====Known Bugs====
- The bears are confused that they are in dwemmer ruines, because of this they do not attack you.
author: Omni

files.name: NoSpiders
files.changelogHtml:
Mod development started.
Dwemer/Dwarven spiders are now brown bears.
